import React from 'react' import { Card, Col, Image } from 'react-bootstrap' import star from '../assets/star.png' import { Navigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { DEVICE_ROUTE } from '../utils/consts' const DeviceItem = ({device}) => { const history = Navigate() return (
Samsung...
{device.rating}
{device.name}
 ) } export default DeviceItem
